hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Mayo Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A creamy blend of mayonnaise with a spicy kick, ideal for complementing Japanese dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Tempura Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A savory blend of soy sauce, mirin, and dashi, perfect for complementing tempura dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Teriyaki Sauce.
hasMenuItem.description: A glossy, dark brown Japanese sauce with a balance of sweet and savory flavors, often used for glazing.

hasMenuItem.name: Korean Spicy Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A bold Korean spicy sauce with a deep red color, offering a mix of heat and a hint of sweetness.

hasMenuItem.name: Sriracha Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A bold, spicy sauce with a smooth texture and a tangy, garlic flavor, originating from Japan.

hasMenuItem.name: Gyoza Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A savory Japanese gyoza sauce with a soy base, seasoned with garlic and a hint of sesame.

hasMenuItem.name: Unagi Sauce(side)
hasMenuItem.description: A rich, sweet sauce made from simmered soy, sugar, and mirin, typically used to enhance grilled eel dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Chili Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A vibrant blend of chilies, sweetened to enhance its bold flavors, ideal for complementing a variety of Japanese dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Agedashi Tofu Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Agedashi tofu sauce with a spicy kick, featuring a savory blend of dashi, soy sauce, and chili.

hasMenuItem.name: Japanese Mayo Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A smooth, creamy Japanese mayo sauce with a rich texture, ideal for complementing a variety of dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Goma-ae Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A traditional Japanese sesame sauce made with ground sesame seeds, often used to dress vegetables or salads.

review.reviewBody: Very good Japanese food. A great menu with plenty of selection. The Inari nigiri reminds me of my grandmother's cooking. Highly recommended!

Ordered the Tuna Poke Bowl and Chicken Yaki Soba. I've driven past this restaurant so many times and decided to give it a try. 

Tuna Poke Bowl: DELICIOUS and VERY GENEROUS with their ingredients compared to other sushi restaurants in the area. Fish is fresh, tasty and overall a solid choice!

Chicken Yaki Soba: Noodle to veggie ratio is 10/10! Other places throw in too much veggies and make the dish more "Yaki Veggies" rather than "Yakisoba". Chicken is tasty and has a crunch on the outside and reder inside. 

Will definitely order more from them!
We have been ordering from here ever since they opened and the sushi is always fresh.  The best Spicy Roll Combo ever!!
Great quality and service, the sushi Spicy Love Burrito is large and fresh. It's my go to dish at Sushiway.
Best Spicy Salmon Oshi Sushi I've had in a long time. Super tasty sauces. All very fresh, we will certainly order again.
